name: Take this Meet The Robinsons Quiz! Average Trivia |   Movies

questions.text: What did Lewis' roommate, Goob, tell Lewis his favorite sport was?
questions.explanation:
Baseball.

	Michael Yagoobian was Lewis' roommate at the 6th Street Orphanage. He loved baseball and was always seen in his baseball uniform. Goob told Lewis, "It's my destiny to play the game."

questions.text: During an adoption interview, what food had Lewis made an invention for that he wanted to show off to the prospective parents?
questions.explanation:
Peanut butter and jelly.

	Lewis didn't know that the husband at the interview was allergic to peanuts. His invention would make it easier to put peanut butter and jelly on bread, but Lewis' invention became clogged and when Lewis unclogged the machine it sprayed peanut butter on the husband. The wife had to use an EpiPen to help the husband and the two left without finishing the interview.

questions.text: What company sponsored the science fair that Lewis attended?
questions.explanation:
Inventco.

	Lewis' science teacher gave him the flier for the science fair and the name of the company that was sponsoring it was on the top of the sheet. The bowler hat man would later meet with the men from Inventco.

questions.text: What was the name of Lewis' science fair project?
questions.explanation:
Memory Scanner.

	Lewis built the memory scanner from parts he found around the orphanage and school. When it was his time for the science fair project to be displayed, the bowler hat man dismantled parts of the memory scanner so it wouldn't work. When the science fair ended, the bowler hat man put the project back together and stole it to take to Inventco.

questions.text: What was the name of the hat that the bowler hat man wore?
questions.explanation:
Doris.

	Doris was invented by Cornelius Robinson to be a helper hat, but something went wrong and the hat began to cause problems for people. Cornelius Robinson had the hat shut down and put in a vault, but something happened and the hat was able to escape the vault.

questions.text: Lewis screamed the first time he met the Robinsons' butler. What made Lewis so scared of the butler?
options: The butler was a two headed man.
The butler was an old man with his head on backward.
questions.explanation:
The butler was an octopus.

	Lewis was prodded by twins living in two pots outside the Robinsons' door to ring the doorbell. When the door opened a large pink octopus opened the door. Lewis screamed and ran away. The octopus was the Robinsons' butler and was named Lefty.

questions.text: Bowler hat man revealed himself to Lewis as his former roommate Goob.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Goob spent his life hating Lewis because Lewis kept Goob up all night while Lewis was working on his project in their bedroom. When game day came, Goob fell asleep in the field and missed the winning play. Lewis went on do great things and Goob continued to live in the orphanage. With the help of the bowler hat, Goob went back into the past to ruin Lewis' invention.

questions.text: When Lewis asked Wilbur about Wilbur's father, who did Wilbur Robinson tell Lewis his father resembled?
questions.explanation:
Tom Selleck.

	Wilbur went through his family history with Lewis, but glossed over his father because Lewis didn't know that he was Wilbur's father in the future. Wilbur told Lewis his father looked like Tom Selleck. When Lewis met Wilbur's father, he was voiced by Tom Selleck.

questions.text: Did Lewis see his biological mother face to face when Wilbur Robinson took him back to the day Lewis' mother left him at the orphanage?
questions.explanation:
No.

	The interesting thing about this scene is that it was shown at the beginning of the movie as well as the end. The noise the mother heard that frightened her was her son's foot slipping off a step. When the mother ran away from the orphanage leaving the baby at the door, Lewis rang the doorbell so Mildred would find the baby. Lewis never saw his mother's face.

questions.text: When Lewis was given a second chance at the science fair to show off his science project, Mrs. Krunklehorn was his guinea pig. What day did Mrs. Krunklehorn tell Lewis she wanted to return to in her memories?
options: The day before the science fair
The day she and her husband adopted their son
questions.explanation:
The day of her wedding.

	When Lewis saw Mrs. Krunklehorn's wedding day, he realized that Mrs. Krunklehorn was married to Bud and they were his parents in the future. The Krunklehorns adopted Lewis and they bought the house that Lewis saw in the future.
